Class OrderMenu.DrinkItem

java.lang.Object
OrderMenu.OrderItem
OrderMenu.DrinkItem
Enclosing class:
OrderMenu
protected static class OrderMenu.DrinkItem
extends OrderMenu.OrderItem
A class representing a drink with a size, amount of ice, variety, and cost.

  • Constructor Details

    • DrinkItem

      DrinkItem​(java.lang.String size, java.lang.String ice, java.lang.String variety)
      Creates an instance of the DrinkItem class. The cost of the item is calculated based on the size of the drink.
      Parameters:
      size - The size of the drink. The valid sizes are (case insensitive): "SMALL", "MEDIUM", "LARGE", "EXTRA-LARGE". Any size that does match one of those will default to "EXTRA LARGE" and print a warning message to the console.
      ice - The amount of ice in the drink. E.g. Light, Regular
      variety - The variety of the drink. E.g. Water, Coca-Cola, Sprite Zero, etc.

  • Method Details

    • getIce

      java.lang.String getIce()
      Returns:
      The amount of ice in the drink. E.g. Light, Regular

    • getVariety

      java.lang.String getVariety()
      Returns:
      The variety of the drink. E.g. Water, Coca-Cola, Sprite Zero, etc.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      Returns a String in the following format:

      Drink: size, variety, ice ice, $cost
